name: Channel flow status
functionStatement: Ensures habitat availability and water quality during low water levels, and indicates non-storm conditions experienced the majority of the time.
descriptionMarkdown: Evaluates whether the reach maintains adequate wetted depth and continuity during low flow by integrating pool depth, wetted length, exposed bed, and Q90/Q10 differences.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Estimate percent of channel length wetted at typical low-flow conditions and document with photos where feasible.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: >75% of channel wetted at normal low flow (or dryness is normal if ephemeral).

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: <25% wetted, or mostly disconnected pools in a historically perennial reach.
